title: Account Labs Raises $7.7 Million for New Google-Enabled Crypto Wallet
description: Account Labs' UniPass wallet is yet another step in the direction of making crypto wallets "smarter" using account abstraction.

title: Bitcoin stays its course below $27,000 despite wavering U.S inflation
description:
Quick Take The latest U.S. Consumer Price Index (CPI) data reflects a nuanced picture, with Month-over-Month figures surpassing the consensus by 0.1%. The numbers portray a subtly mixed economic landscape with a year-over-year inflation rate slightly surpassing consensus figures at 3.7% and core inflation undershooting expectations by 0.2% to settle at 4.1%. Interestingly, the crypto […]

The post Bitcoin stays its course below $27,000 despite wavering U.S inflation appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Argentine Peso Plummets as Presidential Candidate Milei Compares It to Excrement, Gets Accused of Causing Bank Run
description: The Argentine Peso has plummeted to record lows after Javier Milei, the presidential candidate that several polls give as the winner in the upcoming elections, said its value was lower than excrement. Milei, who has proposed to dollarize the country, ending the central bank, has been accused of “public intimidation” by President Alberto Fernandez. Milei […]

title: Ankr and XDC Network form alliance for web3 advancements
description: Ankr has integrated the XDC Network into its RPC service. This advancement stands as a testament to Ankr’s commitment to streamlining the development of decentralized applications on the XDC Network. This partnership ensures that developers can now access the full prowess of the XDC Network, crafting efficient Web3 solutions. Moreover, this integration especially aligns with ... Read more

title: Elliptic ties Russian hackers to the FTX stolen funds
description: As if matters couldn’t get any worse, days after the collapse of the crypto exchange FTX, the exchange was hacked for $475 million. Elliptic, a blockchain analytics company, stated that it has now uncovered clues that may reveal who was behind the attack. Shortly after the breach, $74 million was transferred through RenBridge, a platform ... Read more

title: Court acknowledges Circle’s amicus brief in Binance case
description: In a recent development, Judge Amy Berman Jackson of the Columbian District Court has acted decisively ahead of an essential hearing in the SEC vs. Binance saga. She has addressed several lingering motions in the case against Binance, the prominent crypto exchange, brought forth by the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Significantly, among ... Read more

title: Unlocking the Power of Ripple: Get Your Pre-IPO Shares Today

title: BREAKING: Binance Halts Trading for Polkadot (DOT) and 23 Others; Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and 6 More Affected Previously
description: Binance is removing specific trading pairs on October 13, 2023, due to factors like low liquidity and trading volume. Spot Trading Bots for these pairs will also be terminated, so users should update or cancel them in time. title: SEC Responds to Coinbase’s Rulemaking Petition; Details Remain Shrouded
description:
Coinbase’s Chief Legal Officer, Paul Grewal, revealed that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has communicated with the Third Circuit regarding Coinbase’s rulemaking petition, marking progress in their legal dispute. However, the details of the SEC’s response remain vague, causing concern. Back in April 2023, Coinbase filed a mandamus petition, seeking the SEC’s prompt […]

The post SEC Responds to Coinbase’s Rulemaking Petition; Details Remain Shrouded appeared first on Coin Edition.
